content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I am glad to hear that you are interested in renting my apartment. I am open to negotiations. Please, make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, well, I am a student so I don't have a lot of money. I was wondering if you could offer me a special student discount?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am not in the business of offering discounts. I want to get the highest price possible for my property. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I would like to rent your apartment for 400 euros a month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That is too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too low. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too low. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 550 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
